name: bicep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
another word for
biceps : the large muscle at the front of the upper arm: He has a tattoo of a rose on his bicep. She flexed her right bicep. See also
bicep curl
More examplesFewer examplesI noticed some small scars on his bicep.His bulging bicep was visible through his shirt.She tore a bicep muscle and was unable to play.Doctors found that the dog had bitten through his bicep.He tattooed his wife's name on his left bicep, then later had it removed.
